name: Last Cookie Left
description:
This game is a submission to Weekly Game Jam 149 (Theme: "Last one Left")

Play as a cube to beat your opponent to get the last cookie, last player to get the cookie or get the most score from "conquering" platforms wins the round, win 3 rounds to win the game.

Play Locally or Online!


Controls: 

W - Jump

AD - Move
(For player 2 use arrow keys)

Currently Multiplayer is bugged
Credits:

Pedro Rainha - Programmer / "Art"

Jake Turner - Programmer / Networking

James Foss - Sound Designer

(Kenney assets also provided our Select Button Sound)
